name: Enveloped in Darkness 2.0
description:
The game is a randomly generated runner, where you have to collect 5 shards within a given time limit ( 50 seconds ). There are 3 ghosts following you through the dungeon and you have to run away from them, or do you ;). You can shoot the ghosts with left mouse click and that will bounce them away from you. 

Programming: Dorijan Fabijanic

Art: Jan Metzger - Sober

Music: Antonio Nezic

Built for Community Game Jam
